short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download ChatGPT messages as .txt files in markdown format, with one-click enable/disable.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever wanted a simple and effective way to download ChatGPT messages? Look no further! This extension lets you effortlessly save ChatGPT outputs in TXT format with just a click.

ðŸ”¹ Features:

- One-click download: Just click on the clipboard icon on ChatGPT outputs, and voila! Your chat is saved in TXT format.

- Markdown Support: The saved TXT files retain the markdown formatting from ChatGPT outputs, ensuring your chat looks just as good offline.

- Enable/Disable Toggle: Want to pause the extension temporarily? No worries! Simply click the extension icon to enable/disable it.

ðŸ”¹ Use Cases:

1. Offline Reference: Save ChatGPT outputs for offline use. Perfect for researchers, students, or anyone wanting to revisit their ChatGPT interactions without internet access.

2. Bulk Posting: Ideal for bloggers and content creators! The saved TXT files can be seamlessly integrated for bulk posting on CMS sites like WordPress, streamlining blogging automation.

3. Archiving Conversations: Preserve memorable or important ChatGPT conversations for future reference or sentimental value.

4. Professional Documentation: Use the downloaded chats as evidence of customer support interactions, feedback sessions, or creative brainstorming.

5. Data Analysis: For analysts and data enthusiasts, collect ChatGPT interactions for pattern recognition, training, or other analytical purposes.

ðŸ”¹ Easy to Use:

Getting started is a breeze! Once installed, click on the clipboard icon on any ChatGPT output. If you wish to pause the extension, use the one-click enable/disable toggle. For detailed instructions, refer to the 'instructions.html' included with the extension.

Experience the ultimate convenience with the ChatGPT Message Downloader. Give it a try today!
